body: yes, it should never be None. `NULL` means that someone didn't specify it, so you should take the default value. `None` means that it **was specified**, but it was `None` and not a list. This is a type mismatch
body_html: yes, it should never be None. NULL means that someone didn't specify it, so you should take the default value. None means that it was specified, but it was None and not a list. This is a type mismatch
